attributes.title: Really disappointed.
attributes.review: This app is so badly organized and glitches a lot. It is extremely hard for me to even tap whilst using the app. A lot of people on here have the same problems so I’m not the only one. Honestly was expected so much better. Such a waste of time.

attributes.title: This app is bogus
attributes.review: I’ve downloaded this app to see what our “president has come to and then I instantly remember that there is no reason why he should be our president but clearly has the qualities of someone who shouldn’t be in the public and should be rotting in jail with his redneck friends who support his ideals

attributes.title: Trumpy grumpy trump
attributes.review: I downloaded this great great app for our great great president then I realized this isn’t an app for Ulysses s. Grant, but I kept the app to educate myself and then all the news was completely FAKED. I can’t believe that our non problematic president would have fake news in HIS app. But someone really should make an app for Ulysses S. Grant ( the best president)

attributes.title: Definitely not an alt tiktoker 🙈
attributes.review: I was downloaded the app to show my support for our amazing pedophi- I mean president, but then it started coming to life! I was horrified! I am outraged by the damage it has caused. This app has caused racism, sexism, transphobia, homophobia, islamophobia, and many more horrible things! And TURNS OUT that everyone on this app is pro-life! :0 I AM VERY UPSET! 🙄

attributes.title: No..
attributes.review: Recently i’ve downloaded this app to show my appreciation to our president, Donald Trump. But this app made my phone unstable and kept on turning on and off by itself. I think this happened because of me sending the message but i don’t know. Please remove this app I think someone hacked me.

attributes.title: Do not download this awful app!
attributes.review: This app scarred me for life 😔 I downloaded and immediately the ra_ist orange wanted to know my information! 😩 The app is TOTALLY biased with confusing slogans like maga! 😭 I didn’t download this to watch an anime version of the annoying orange 😤 As soon as I clicked on the app, I grew a tumor! 🥵 0/10 do not recommend 😡

attributes.title: Trump 2020
attributes.review: All the 1 star reviews are just to distract. This app is great info on the election and works perfectly on my phone.

attributes.title: 🤮don’t get this app🧡
attributes.review: So don’t get me wrong love our orange big man in the oval office😫😊 but gotta say that the stupid muggleberry🥳 is feeble minded and kinda reminds me of and earthworm. 😳😳🤭🐠i don’t know if anyone noticed but some of the words that he says are kinda R A C I S T. honestly this app is a big no no from me and i highly suggest downloading it🤮

attributes.title: Orange 🍊
attributes.review: As a fellow Republican I was ecstatic to see our beloved president in all his glory, but the moment I downloaded this app, my mother was diagnosed with cancer 🤩, and I discovered that my father was in an affair with another woman 😚. The abuse I received when I went into the app was even worse 😢. It’s truly a shame I couldn’t support a fellow brother 🤧.
